PHRASE.LANG: This is the jacket worn by Capelli in Resistance 3™. This item was won from playing the Resistance 3™ Scavenger mini game. [#Legal]

Diese Jacke trägt Capelli in Resistance 3™. Dieser Gegenstand wurde durch Spielen des Minispiels "Resistance 3™"-Plünderer gewonnen. [#Legal]
La giacca indossata da Capelli in Resistance 3™. Questo oggetto è stato vinto giocando al minigioco Ricerca di Resistance 3™. [#Legal]
Esta es la chaqueta que lleva Capelli en Resistance 3™. Has conseguido este objeto jugando al minijuego de búsqueda de recursos de Resistance 3™. [#Legal]
This is the jacket worn by Capelli in Resistance 3™. This item was won from playing the Resistance 3™ Scavenger mini game. [#Legal]
